document.full_text: western conference top seeds san antonio were pushed to the brink of elimination from the first round of the nba playoffs after the memphis grizzlies took a 3-1 series lead with a 104-86 win over the spurs on monday.
document.title: grizzlies push spurs to brink; mavs, nuggets
lines_and_colors: western conference top seeds san antonio were pushed to the brink of elimination from the first round of the nba playoffs after the memphis grizzlies took a 3-1 series lead with a 104-86 win over the spurs on monday.
